    RegionObserver.postBatchMutateIndispensably(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> ctx, MiniBatchOperationInProgress<Mutation> miniBatchOp, boolean success)
    Called after the completion of batch put/delete/increment/append and will be called even if the batch operation fails.
    default void
    RegionObserver.preBatchMutate(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> c, MiniBatchOperationInProgress<Mutation> miniBatchOp)
    This will be called for every batch mutation operation happening at the server.
